doc:
Noele Gordon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noele_Gordon 0 Joan Noele Gordon (25 December 1919 – 14 April 1985) was a British stage, film, television actress and presenter. She played the role of Meg Mortimer (originally Richardson) in the long-running British soap opera Crossroads from 1964 to 1981. Joan_Noele_Gordon ( 25_December_1919 – 14_April_1985 ) was a_British_stage , film , television_actress_and_presenter . She played the_role of Meg_Mortimer (_originally_Richardson_) in the_long-running_British_soap_opera_Crossroads from 1964 to 1981 .
